BE AWARE: There is some corruption in the video in Chapter 8 (about 01:38 into the disc, halfway through file VTS_02_4.VOB) through the beginning of Chapter 9. I've tried several different torrents from different trackers and they all exhibit this behavour, so I suspect the original rip had the problem. Too bad, because it's a pretty important scene (Anjin insisting, to the point of seppuku, on Yabu sparing the village)...
